title: Group portrait of "Queen" Mabel Buford, center, seated between Clara Conover and unknown woman, with participants including; Janet Robertson, Anna Glover, Rose Posie, Magnolia Riggins, Lucy King, Mary Phillips, Barbara Bush, Amy Vasser, Lilliard Chapman, Clara Warkins, Lucille Jackson, Carolyn Diggs, Mary E. Nelson, Billie Smith, Jackie Page, Ruth Watkins, and Pearl Holland, posed in front of altar in Rodman Street Baptist Church during State Pew Rally
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
